body:
Ω Community Update Ω

By  Administration team

Recent Promotions / Demotions

There have been quite a bit of promotions and demotions / retirements  since our last official community update.

- Tomqss has been promoted to Junior Moderator
- Wulfcaspice has been promoted to Map Developer
- Hete has stepped down from Moderator
- Sayah has stepped down from Translator and Referee
- vladthegreat100 has been demoted from Media

Tournament News

New tournament announcements have been made! Tazz has created an information post for the upcoming tournament called "Battle of Eternity". The event team has been working hard to make this happen, and finally it has been announced that the tournament will start on June 1st. If you have any questions regarding this tournament, Edans has made a Q&A post. 

"Ask the Senior" sub forum

Ask the Senior sub forum will be completely dedicated to allowing community members to ask any questions they may have for the Senior staff team. Please keep in mind that troll questions will be ignored! All staff member complaints must still be sent to support@avicus.net

Avicus Public Relations

A new twitter has been created to allow the senior staff team to advertise a lot more. This twitter will server as a contact resource to gain youtuber sponsors, and to furthermore show off Avicus's progress (lets get more players!) It is @AvicusPR

Shortened policies!

New shortened policies have been created by Slicy and Arigenn to make them more manageable, and easier to read. All staff are expected to follow these, and you may find them here. 

Avicus Community Slack

The Administrator team is still encouraging you all to join community slack, just remember to contact an admin to be added to it! Thanks to PieZ, we have official rules in place now that users will have to stick to, although they are quite straight forward. In addition to this Jahaj has been promoted to Community Administrator!

General Rules:
  • No links to pornography, phishing sites, keyloggers, scams, etc.(3 Points)
  • No harassing users in all chats(Depends how bad. Talk to over staff about it)
  • No rumors/drama. We're trying to get away from that.(1 Point)
  • Try to remain calm and civilized in situations.(1 Point)
  • No death threats or threatening to Ddos (3 Points)
  • We have a three strike limit. These strikes will be removed if the strike was given on an older date and the staff feels it has been a long enough time
  • Making a leaving thread will get you kicked out of slack. Unless stated that you do not wish to leave.
  • Each room has different levels of it being moderated. Low moderated means the channel is very lenient. Medium moderated means the channel will be regularly moderated. Highly moderated means it will be very strict with moderators .

Channels

  • #announcements(Highly Moderated) •Do not post in this channel unless otherwise told to by an admin. If you wish to discuss what is said on the announcements, please talk about it in #general
  • #avicus(Medium Moderated)
  • #competitive (Medium moderated)
  • #feedback(Highly Moderated)
  • #games(Medium Moderated)
  • #general(Medium Moderated)
  • #help (Highly moderated)
  • #map-making (Medium moderated)
  • #music
    • •Do not post Music that is harmful to others ears or disturbing
  • #random(Low Moderated)

That's all for now!

Ω Community Update Ω

By  Administration team

Recent Promotions / Demotions

There have been quite a bit of promotions and demotions / retirements  since our last official community update.

- Tomqss has been promoted to Junior Moderator

- vladthegreat100 has been demoted from Media

Tournament News

New tournament announcements have been made! Tazz has created an information post for the upcoming tournament called "Battle of Eternity". The event team has been working hard to make this happen, and finally it has been announced that the tournament will start on June 1st. If you have any questions regarding this tournament, Edans has made a Q&A post. 

"Ask the Senior" sub forum

Ask the Senior sub forum will be completely dedicated to allowing community members to ask any questions they may have for the Senior staff team. Please keep in mind that troll questions will be ignored! All staff member complaints must still be sent to support@avicus.net

A new twitter has been created to allow the senior staff team to advertise a lot more. This twitter will server as a contact resource to gain youtuber sponsors, and to furthermore show off Avicus's progress (lets get more players!) It is @AvicusPR

Shortened policies!

New shortened policies have been created by Slicy and Arigenn to make them more manageable, and easier to read. All staff are expected to follow these, and you may find them here. 

Avicus Community Slack

The Administrator team is still encouraging you all to join community slack, just remember to contact an admin to be added to it! Thanks to PieZ, we have official rules in place now that users will have to stick to, although they are quite straight forward. In addition to this Jahaj has been promoted to Community Administrator!

General Rules:
  • No links to pornography, phishing sites, keyloggers, scams, etc.(3 Points)
  • No harassing users in all chats(Depends how bad. Talk to over staff about it)
  • No rumors/drama. We're trying to get away from that.(1 Point)
  • Try to remain calm and civilized in situations.(1 Point)
  • No death threats or threatening to Ddos (3 Points)
  • We have a three strike limit. These strikes will be removed if the strike was given on an older date and the staff feels it has been a long enough time
  • Making a leaving thread will get you kicked out of slack. Unless stated that you do not wish to leave.
  • Each room has different levels of it being moderated. Low moderated means the channel is very lenient. Medium moderated means the channel will be regularly moderated. Highly moderated means it will be very strict with moderators .

Channels

  • #feedback(Highly Moderated)
  • #games(Medium Moderated)
  • #general(Medium Moderated)
  • #help (Highly moderated)
  • #map-making (Medium moderated)
  • #music
    • •Do not post Music that is harmful to others ears or disturbing
  • #random(Low Moderated)

That's all for now!

replies.body:
Sorry to break it to you, however nobody cares about your permanently negative opinion. Seriously, noone could care less. I really don't understand why you still come here, when you are fully aware that everybody dislikes. Do you only come here to annoy people?

Also, you say 'A poorly organised tournament'. You would know that how? We've done 5 posts, how is that disorganised? It will most likely be the most organised tournament so far, yet you wouldn't know that because you don't play, so why are you still here? It's pretty amusing how you say tournaments are terrible in other posts even though tournaments are keeping Avicus alive and that's why 90% of regulars are here. Please, learn your stuff before commenting random stuff.

ANOTHER PLACE FOR PEOPLE TO ASK QUESTIONS AS IF THERE WASN'T ENOUGH ALREADY
Where do people ask questions? Now there's a forum just for seniors to be asked questions. I don't see your problem.

And an advertisement for the 'community slack' that doesn't need to be there
Cool, you don't have to join it - nobody asked you to.

Fantastic work, as ever.
Thanks, means a lot. I'm sure the devs and seniors will be glad to hear it :)

Also, you say 'A poorly organised tournament'. You would know that how? We've done 5 posts, how is that disorganised? It will most likely be the most organised tournament so far, yet you wouldn't know that because you don't play, so why are you still here? It's pretty amusing how you say tournaments are terrible in other posts even though tournaments are keeping Avicus alive and that's why 90% of regulars are here. Please, learn your stuff before commenting random stuff.

ANOTHER PLACE FOR PEOPLE TO ASK QUESTIONS AS IF THERE WASN'T ENOUGH ALREADY
Where do people ask questions? Now there's a forum just for seniors to be asked questions. I don't see your problem.

And an advertisement for the 'community slack' that doesn't need to be there
Cool, you don't have to join it - nobody asked you to.

Fantastic work, as ever.
Thanks, means a lot. I'm sure the devs and seniors will be glad to hear it :)

replies.body:
"Heya. I'm the ex director of staff and administration, who gets salty and criticises everything here because I think it's fun. Take everything I say with a grain of salt, I never mean any harm, but often I do mean what I say."

-Howsie's about section.

Criticism should still be taken on board.
Even though Howise does it in a unique way, how about instead of trying to take shots at him to make yourselves feel better, you take what he has to say on board.

I mean Christ, if you people can tolerate Zac and Michsel on a regular basis, then this should be nothing in comparison.

Even though it's blunt, there are points that Howsie raised in his original post that can be taken on board by the staff team.
And if you're going to say to me, "well what are those points Snow?"
Then clearly you haven't read the comment properly.

replies.body:
This has all become very repetitive, both the updates and the reactions to them. 
:C
I wish we could progress past it all.

EDIT: By repetitive, I mean they repeatedly try to fix and smooth out the same problems over and over again, if only slightly different. I fail to see much progress with these core issues.

replies.body:
Now this is fair feedback, and I can agree.

We've just overcome a large bump in the road, and we've just started ironing out our issues here. Both the admins sat down and worked through exactly what we are gonna do in the next month, and it all sounds very exciting. All I can say it stay up to date with our upcoming community posts, and we'll see where we are in another month.

replies.body:
I personally am thankful for this post. I recently started playing on avicus and a community update is helpful. Good work :D

While the server is not as big and successful as it used to be, I still think that this server is awesome; I love the community and the server itself!

In regards to all the hate going on in this post. I think that it is immature of people to randomly point out issues, without any solutions. I get that you probably just want to help the server improve, and while identifying faults in the server is important, it is still rude, unfair and generally just unkind towards staff to call their work bad.

I also believe that people responding to said replies have been, in some cases, acting immature as well. Responding to people with personal insults based on their opinions is just ridiculous imo; If your trying to squash someones argument based on them 'flaming' then don't throw insults at them.

I don't want to fuel anymore fire, I just wanted to state my opinion.

p.s. I think this post is cool staff. Thank you :)
replies.body_tagged:
I personally am thankful for this post. I recently started playing on avicus and a community update is helpful. Good work :D

While the server is not as big and successful as it used to be, I still think that this server is awesome; I love the community and the server itself!

In regards to all the hate going on in this post. I think that it is immature of people to randomly point out issues, without any solutions. I get that you probably just want to help the server improve, and while identifying faults in the server is important, it is still rude, unfair and generally just unkind towards staff to call their work bad.

I also believe that people responding to said replies have been, in some cases, acting immature as well. Responding to people with personal insults based on their opinions is just ridiculous imo; If your trying to squash someones argument based on them 'flaming' then don't throw insults at them.

I don't want to fuel anymore fire, I just wanted to state my opinion.

p.s. I think this post is cool staff. Thank you :)

replies.body: Thanks. =)
